feed.title: Speedtest Tracker Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Speedtest Tracker: v1.6.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add Spanish (es_ES) localization by @garanda21 in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/2212
  • [Feature] Add Ookla Server List to API by @svenvg93 in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/2213
  • [Feature] Convert API page to Resource by @svenvg93 in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/2214
  • [Feature] Add Schemas to API by @svenvg93 in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/2216
  • [Chore] Add missing Filament Forms and Tables imports by @svenvg93 in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/2220
  • [Chore] Add CI step to validate and update OpenAPI spec by @svenvg93 in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/2222
  • Added notification channel deprecation notice by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/2224
  • npm: bump postcss from 8.5.3 to 8.5.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/2232
  • feat: Add Dutch Translation (I18N) Support by @homelab-alpha in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/2239

New Contributors

  • @homelab-alpha made their first contribution in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/2239

Full Changelog: https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/compare/v1.6.0...v1.6.1

entry.title: New release for Speedtest Tracker: v1.6.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Update Speedtest CLI installation method in Dockerfile by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/2247
  • Filter results by created date by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/2248
  • Add initial devcontainer configuration for Laravel development by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/2252
  • [Chore] Refactor Results Exporter by @svenvg93 in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/2257
  • [Chore] Lock inactive issues and PRs by @svenvg93 in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/2258
  • Revert "[Chore] Lock inactive issues and PRs" by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/2260
  • [Chrore] Fix the CI for locked isseus by @svenvg93 in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/2261
  • [Feature] Add Download/Upload bytes/elapsed to InfluxDB by @svenvg93 in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/2256
  • Release v1.6.2 by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/2268

Full Changelog: https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/compare/v1.6.1...v1.6.2

entry.title: New release for Speedtest Tracker: v1.6.5 (Hotfix for CVE-2025-54068)
entry.content:
